original_text: And Jephthah said unto the elders of Gilead, Did not ye hate me, and expel me out of my father's house? and why are ye come unto me now when ye are in distress?
korean_text: 입다가 길르앗 장로들에게 이르되 너희가 전에 나를 미워하여 내 아버지 집에서 쫓아내지 아니하였느냐 이제 너희가 환난을 당하였다고 어찌하여 내게 왔느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: And Jephthah said unto the elders of Gilead
and expel me out of my father's house?
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 내 아버지 집에서 쫓아내지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: and why are ye come unto me now
